summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Salon Booking System. All major features working correctly including salon/platform admin authentication, FullCalendar dashboard, feature flag toggle, client booking flow, and booking management (confirm/cancel/reschedule).
passed_tests: API: GET /api/salon - Salon profile returns correctly
API: GET /api/services - Services list returns correctly
API: GET /api/features - Public features endpoint works
API: GET /api/auth/me - Returns user info with valid token
API: GET /api/admin/features - Platform admin can view features
API: GET /api/public/availability - Returns slots when enabled
API: POST /api/public/bookings - Creates booking when enabled
API: GET /api/salon/bookings - Returns bookings for salon dashboard
API: GET /api/salon/bookings - Date filter works correctly
API: GET /api/salon/bookings/{id} - Booking detail returns correctly
UI: Salon login page loads correctly at /salon/login
UI: Salon admin login redirects to /salon/dashboard
UI: Platform admin login shows 'Platform Settings' button
UI: Salon dashboard shows FullCalendar with week view
UI: Calendar shows bookings with color-coded status
UI: List view shows bookings with status badges
UI: Booking detail modal shows all info
UI: Confirm/Cancel/Reschedule buttons visible in modal
UI: Platform Features page loads at /admin/features
UI: Book page shows calendar-style booking when enabled
UI: Book page shows WhatsApp fallback when disabled
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: React useEffect dependency warnings in BookPage.jsx, PlatformFeaturesPage.jsx, SalonDashboardPage.jsx - not blocking but should be addressed
Minor: JWT key length warning (29 bytes vs recommended 32 bytes) - security improvement recommended
seed_data_creation: Test bookings created during testing: TEST_Client, TEST_StatusUpdate, TEST_Reschedule
context_for_next_testing_agent: All booking system features are working. The booking_calendar_enabled feature flag is currently set to TRUE. Test bookings exist in the database from automated testing. FullCalendar is properly integrated and showing bookings. Both salon owner and platform admin roles are working correctly with proper access control.

features_verified.salon_dashboard: FullCalendar with week view, day/month views, list view
features_verified.client_booking_enabled: 3-step flow: service → date/time → details → WhatsApp confirm
